name: Frail Ascent
description:
"Can we try one last time ?"

Frail ascent is a game about the last chance of a civilization ( Ours ? Naaahh look at them and their ruined world... clearly it can't be us.) to rise again in the middle of what's left. But can they do it while maintaining the stability of their last home ? Will they ruin everything again or will they manage to preserve the balance.

Well it's up to you.

Manage the last colony and make it grow. But don't be too greedy. Weight matter.

Code by @ql28 Sound design and music by @Jordan-Andriulo Art by @Pandore
